name: Crestpeak Bay
description:
WELCOME TO CRESTPEAK BAY!

Play as Aria, the new girl, as she begins her fitness journey, meeting new people and working out in the relaxing beach town of Crestpeak Bay. Don't forget to pay your rent!

Support the game! https://www.patreon.com/crestpeakbay

Follow us! https://twitter.com/CrestpeakBay
https://www.instagram.com/crestpeakbay/
https://www.reddit.com/r/crestpeak/
https://crestpeakbay.tumblr.com

Join our community! https://discord.gg/5rqaBPc
